short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear downloads list of all completed downloads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically hides completed download items 5 seconds after the download is complete.
It is manifest v3 compliant, so it can be used for a long time.

This extension does not possess or collect any personal data, including analytics.
The implementation is very simple, so please check it out if you are interested.
